General.Name: Beiqi Foton Motor Co Ltd
General.Description: Beiqi Foton Motor Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells commercial vehicles worldwide. The company offers passenger vehicles, such as vans and pickups; light-duty trucks; medium and heavy-duty trucks; buses and coaches; mini trucks and special vehicles, as well as construction machinery. It also provides total care, parts, and financing services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: North of Laoniuwan Village, Beijing, China, 102206
